PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13612022-12-15,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectOrder Respecting the Restraint of Property Situated in Canada (Roman Arkadyevich Abramovich)
PrecisORDER RESPECTING THE RESTRAINT OF PROPERTY SITUATED IN CANADA (ROMAN ARKADYEVICH ABRAMOVICH) in order to restrain the amount of US$26,073,990.35 that is owned, or that is held or controlled, directly or indirectly, by an individual listed under the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations, and that is credited to a bank account held by Manticore Fund (Cayman) LTD with Citco Bank Canada in such a manner that no dealing can be carried out with respect to that amount.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0279 Publication Date: 2023-01-04
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Respecting the Restraint of Property Situated in Canada (Roman Arkadyevich Abramovich)
precis: ORDER RESPECTING THE RESTRAINT OF PROPERTY SITUATED IN CANADA (ROMAN ARKADYEVICH ABRAMOVICH) in order to restrain the amount of US$26,073,990.35 that is owned, or that is held or controlled, directly or indirectly, by an individual listed under the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations, and that is credited to a bank account held by Manticore Fund (Cayman) LTD with Citco Bank Canada in such a manner that no dealing can be carried out with respect to that amount.
